org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 ScannerContext.LimitFields

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.ScannerContext.LimitFields
  • 封闭类:
    ScannerContext

    private static class ScannerContext.LimitFields
extends Object
    The different fields that can be used as limits in calls to InternalScanner.next(java.util.List) and InternalScanner.next(java.util.List)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) int batch 
      (专用程序包) long dataSize 
      private static int DEFAULT_BATCH
      Default values of the limit fields.
      private static ScannerContext.LimitScope DEFAULT_SCOPE
      Default scope that is assigned to a limit if a scope is not specified.
      private static long DEFAULT_SIZE 
      private static long DEFAULT_TIME 
      (专用程序包) long heapSize 
      (专用程序包) ScannerContext.LimitScope sizeScope 
      (专用程序包) long time 
      (专用程序包) ScannerContext.LimitScope timeScope 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LimitFields()
      Fields keep their default values.

    • 字段详细资料

      • DEFAULT_BATCH

        private static int DEFAULT_BATCH
        Default values of the limit fields. Defined such that if a field does NOT change from its default, it will not be enforced

      • DEFAULT_SIZE

        private static long DEFAULT_SIZE

      • DEFAULT_TIME

        private static long DEFAULT_TIME

      • DEFAULT_SCOPE

        private static final ScannerContext.LimitScope DEFAULT_SCOPE
        Default scope that is assigned to a limit if a scope is not specified.
